TextBody:
Hello Feral,

Thank you for contacting Netwrix Support support.

Unfortunately at the moment we do not have a compatible build for Fedora 42, however a request can be submitted to our R&D team to build a compatible EPP client.   Would you like us to make the request internally on your behalf?


Kind regards
__________________

TextBody:
Hello Feral,

We have recently implemented a new method of making feature requests which will allow our customers to submit requests directly via the Netwrix Ideas Portal.  The request for the Fedora 42 compatible build will need to be made with the new method.  We kindly ask that you submit the request for a compatible EPP client build via the Netwrix Idea Portal please.

Weâ€™re excited to let you know that Netwrix has launched the Netwrix Ideas Portal, a space where you can submit feature suggestions, vote on ideas from others, and directly influence future product enhancements.
 
You can post your ideas for Netwrix Endpoint Protector using this link:
ðŸ‘‰ https://community.netwrix.com/c/products/endpoint-protector/ideas/109

To help you get started, here's a quick guide on how to use the portal:
ðŸ“˜  https://community.netwrix.com/t/getting-started-with-the-netwrix-ideas-portal/5190
 
We look forward to seeing your ideas and thank you again for helping us improve our solutions!

Please let me know if you encounter any issues or need any assistance.

Kind regards
